description: This project will enable Kiribati to prepare its Second National Communication (SNC) to the Conference of the Parties of the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

subproject.description: Through the project, Kiribati will prepare a National Communication comprising three major elements: a national greenhouse gas inventory, abatement analysis, and vulnerability and adaptation assessments. The project will assist Kiribati meet its reporting obligations to the UNFCCC.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Kiribati SNC

title: KIRIBATI Second National Communication (SNC)
